concepts.name: Basic Algebra
concepts.description: Rearranging equations, substitution, and solving for unknowns — the foundation for all physics.

concepts.name: Right Triangles
concepts.description: Properties of right-angled triangles and the Pythagorean theorem.

concepts.name: Trigonometry
concepts.description: Sine, cosine, tangent and their applications in resolving components.

concepts.name: Newton's Laws of Motion
concepts.description: The three fundamental laws governing force, mass and acceleration.

concepts.name: Vector Decomposition
concepts.description: Breaking vectors into horizontal and vertical components using trigonometry.

concepts.name: Kinematic Equations
concepts.description: The four equations of motion for uniformly accelerated bodies.

concepts.name: Work, Energy & Power
concepts.description: Work done by forces, kinetic and potential energy, conservation laws and power.

concepts.name: Projectile Motion
concepts.description: Analysing the parabolic path of objects launched at an angle under gravity.

concepts.name: Gravitation
concepts.description: Newton's law of universal gravitation, gravitational field and potential.

concepts.name: Simple Harmonic Motion
concepts.description: Oscillatory motion described by sine/cosine functions — springs and pendulums.

concepts.name: Wave Motion
concepts.description: Transverse and longitudinal waves, wavelength, frequency, speed and superposition.

concepts.name: Current Electricity
concepts.description: Electric current, Ohm's law, resistance, series and parallel circuits.

concepts.name: Magnetic Fields
concepts.description: Magnetic force on charges and conductors, Biot-Savart law, Ampere's law.
